name: Taskade
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA; Singapore, Singapore
long_description:
Experience the future of team collaboration with Taskade, the next-generation AI-powered productivity tool for teams. Seamlessly share tasks, projects, and notes, and engage in real-time organization with structured note-taking and mind mapping. 

Our in-app AI chat assistant and video chat enable you to work together like never before, no matter where you are. Generate tasks, mind maps, and more available on any device. 

Get work done faster and smarter with Taskade - experience the future of team productivity. 🐑 🌐
one_liner: AI-Powered Productivity — A Second Brain for You and  Your Teams
